PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string, the path of the directory containing the interfacing functions
: The list of required simulation functions

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: Without argument create_palette() build all the initial scicos palettes and store then in SCIDIR/macros/scicos/.
create_palette(Path) build the palette associated with all *.sci files contained in the directory given by Path. The palette file is store in this directory.
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.P: N.B. : all *.sci file contained in the directory are assumed to be Scicos interfacing functions
